direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve account-related information but focus on different aspects (spot asset summary vs. general assets).
Both methods involve fetching summary information about an account, with similar control flows and parameter handling.
Both methods provide summary information about an account, though for different types of accounts (spot vs. futures).

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the RequestHandler to be initialized and configured correctly.
Environment setup is required before making any account-related requests.
Both methods need to verify the format and correctness of the response received.
